p.italic: “Um- First of all at the beginning it was very hard. Because I’m not used to taking medications, and sometimes I forget to take medications. And I remember they gave me one of these-{pillbox}. Yeah, so I put all the pills in the boxes to remember better. After a few years it become almost a part of me. You know? A habit. It’s automatic. Yeah, nobody need to remind me or stuff like that. So, I don’t miss my pills.”
